name: D/D/D Marksman King Tell
effectText:
2 Level 5 monsters
You can also Xyz Summon this card by using a Rank 4 "D/D/D" Xyz Monster you control (transfer its materials to this card). Once per turn, if you took any effect damage this turn (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster on the field; it loses 1000 ATK/DEF, and if it does, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can send 1 "D/D" or "Dark Contract" card from your Deck to the GY.
